capabilities.description: Dockge is able to chown files.
capabilities.name: CHOWN

capabilities.description: Dockge is able to bypass permission checks.
capabilities.name: DAC_OVERRIDE

capabilities.description: Dockge is able to bypass permission checks for it's sub-processes.
capabilities.name: FOWNER

capabilities.description: Dockge is able to kill processes.
capabilities.name: KILL

capabilities.description: Dockge is able to set group ids.
capabilities.name: SETGID

capabilities.description: Dockge is able to set user ids.
capabilities.name: SETUID

capabilities.description: Dockge is able to set capabilities.
capabilities.name: SETPCAP

capabilities.description: Dockge is able to set file capabilities.
capabilities.name: SETFCAP

1.1.2.readme:
Dockge

Dockge is a fancy, easy-to-use and reactive self-hosted docker compose.yaml stack-oriented manager
